entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to freezing rain then changing to periods of rain near noon and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning after midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023
